events.title: Programming for everyone
events.description: Everyone can learn to code! We are going to learn the basics of programming in JavaScript.

events.title: Networking for everyone
events.description: We know: Networking is not fun for everyone. That is why we have created this event for you!

events.title: Networking for extroverts
events.description: You probably need no help with networking in general. But focusing your energy correctly - that is something where most people can improve.
